casebody.data:
Louis Windmüller, et al., respondents, v. Horace K. Thurber, et al., appellants. Decided June 5, 1885. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon the verdict of a jury, and from order denying motion for new trial. More, Arlington & More, for appellants. Cephas Brainerd, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion by Freedman, J.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
